string.value: After observing the stunning scenery of Orbis, I should start up a conversation with Elma.
Elma offered to take me to Ludibrium. Once I get there, she advised me to look for Marcel...
I was able to meet up with Marcel. Where will I go next?
Alright, how was Orbis? It's hard to find a more beautiful sky than the ones here. Ready to go to the next spot?
Alright, I'll send you to Ludibrium, a toy land to say the least.
Once you arrive there, talk to #eMarcel#n, and he'll take you to another spot.
Oh, and, if you step outside, you'll encounter some very adorable monsters, and it won't be such a rosy experience for you. Be careful.
Hey,do you really like it here? There's plenty of time, so just relax and enjoy it here!
Welcome! Elma told me of your arrival. Have fun at Ludibrium!
